text: Please listen carefully to the following summary of your contract terms and conditions. You are agreeing to a twenty-four-month mobile service agreement with Vodacom, beginning today. Your monthly subscription fee is three hundred rand, which includes the premium package with unlimited data, unlimited voice minutes, and unlimited SMS messages. Your new device, the iPhone 16 Pro, remains under the standard manufacturer warranty for twelve months, covering factory faults and defects only. Accidental or liquid damage is not included unless you have chosen to add device protection. If you choose to cancel your contract before the twenty-four-month period ends, an early termination fee equal to the remaining subscription balance may apply. Your personal information will be processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy, available at Vodacom dot co dot za, and may be used for account management and service notifications. We never share your information with third parties without your consent. Please note that your contract will automatically continue month-to-month after the initial term unless you give thirty days written notice to cancel. By confirming this agreement, you acknowledge that you have understood and accepted these terms, and that the information provided during this call is true and correct. Thank you for choosing Vodacom. We appreciate your business.
